document_data.name: Council of Five
document_data.mainbody: The '''Council of Five''' was the ruling body of government in the town of [[Drubiev]] in the [[Great Amber Steppes]] of the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities: As the name implied, the council comprised five elected officials charged with making decisions about Drubiev's affairs, including the appointment of the First Contable. The five councilmen and women were prominent figures of Drubiev who were elected as a group during every [[Shieldmeet]].
document_data.Members: Known members of the council as of 1375 DR included [[Emmezel Tersku]], [[Pavel Tragosk]], and [[Aevan Dragorovich]].
